thread.title: Ronda Rousey blasts Justin Bieber for being rude - Business Standard
thread.title_full: Ronda Rousey blasts Justin Bieber for being rude - Business Standard

title: Ronda Rousey blasts Justin Bieber for being rude - Business Standard
text:
Ronda Rousey blasts Justin Bieber for being rude IANS | October 8, 2015 Last Updated at 16:10 IST email this article Type address separated by commas Your Email: Enter the characters shown in the image. Send me a copy: Copy tiny URL to save and share articles. ALSO READ Ronda Rousey tapped for 'Road House' remake Fighter Ronda Rousey to play herself in biopic Ronda Rousey thrashes body shamers calling her 'masculine' I want to play Captain Marvel: Ronda Rousey ESPN host backs Ronda Rousey against 'horrible person' Mayweather 
Mixed martial artist and actress Ronda Rousey has blasted singer Justin Bieber for being "really rude" to her younger sister Julie. 
The "Entourage" actress, who met the "What do you mean?" hitmaker at Cannes Film festival in France earlier this year, shared that Bieber refused to take a photograph with Julie, reports femalefirst.co.uk. 
"Justin Bieber was actually really rude to my little sister at the Cannes Film Festival. My little sister is very hard to impress so we didn't really care about anybody that was at the Cannes Film Festival but I wanted to spend some time with her," Cosmpolitan magazine quoted Rousey as saying. 
"Justin Bieber was taking some pictures with some ladies and she suddenly got really excited and was like, 'Do you think he'd want to take a picture with me?' I was like, 'Sure Julie, don't worry about it, everyone's taking pictures today. Don't feel bad, that's why everybody's here... look at him, he's a sweetheart," she added. 
However, Rousey said the pop star snubbed her little siter, as he had "already taken a billion pictures" that day. 
"I walked over there and said, 'Excuse me,' he turned and goes, 'I've already taken a billion pictures today, OK.' I said, 'Yeah but' -- because my sister is the only 16-year-old girl at the whole party -- I only got, 'Yeah but' out before he goes, 'A billion' and walks off and totally snubs my little sister," the 28-year-old said.
